summary: This document is an invoice summary from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein, detailing charges for shipping services. The invoice includes shipment details, amounts due, and contact information for FedEx Revenue Services. It highlights transactions made by Epstein, including shipments sent and received, along with associated fees.

keyFacts: The invoice number is 7-195-03586, dated March 30, 2005.
Total charges on the invoice amount to $56.02.
Two shipments were referenced in the invoice, both involving Jeffrey E. Epstein.
